title: How I built a jet suit
description: We've all dreamed of flying -- but for Richard Browning, flight is an obsession. He's built an Iron Man-like suit that leans on an elegant collaboration of mind, body and technology, bringing science fiction dreams a little closer to reality. Learn more about the trial and error process behind his invention and take flight with Browning in an unforgettable demo.
author: Richard Browning
keywords: TED, talks, adventure, collaboration, design, engineering, flight, entrepreneur, future, innovation, invention, motivation, demo, potential, technology
